001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.validator.RestResponseValidatorImpl;
004import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
005import java.util.Map;
006import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
007
008/**
009 * Enhances {@link RestResponseValidatorImpl} with Allure reporting.
010 *
011 * <p>This class logs assertion validation details to Allure, providing
012 * insights into the response validation process.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016@Component
017public class RestResponseValidatorAllureImpl extends RestResponseValidatorImpl {
018
019   /**
020    * Logs validation targets to Allure reports.
021    *
022    * <p>Overrides {@link RestResponseValidatorImpl#printAssertionTarget(Map)} to attach
023    * extracted validation data as an Allure step.
024    *
025    * @param data The extracted response data mapped to assertion keys.
026    */
027   @Override
028   protected void printAssertionTarget(final Map<String, Object> data) {
029      Allure.step("Validating response with " + data.size() + " assertion(s)", () -> {
030         super.printAssertionTarget(data);
031         Allure.addAttachment("Data to be validated", data.toString());
032         if (data.containsKey("statusCode")) {
033            Allure.addAttachment("Expected Status Code", data.get("statusCode").toString());
034         }
035         if (data.containsKey("headers")) {
036            Allure.addAttachment("Expected Headers", data.get("headers").toString());
037         }
038         if (data.containsKey("body")) {
039            Allure.addAttachment("Expected Response Body", data.get("body").toString());
040         }
041      });
042   }
043
044}
